name: Task Management MCP Server
description: Expose task management capabilities as MCP tools for autonomous agents. Based on the Task Management ALPS profile.

tools.name: home
tools.description: Navigate to the API home document. ALPS id: goHome.

tools.name: listTasks
tools.description: Retrieve the full collection of tasks. ALPS id: goTaskList.

tools.name: filterTasks
tools.description: Retrieve a filtered list of tasks using fields such as title, dueDate, status, priority, and assignedUser. ALPS id: goFilteredTasks.

title.description: Filter tasks whose title matches or contains this value.

dueDate.description: Filter tasks that are due on this date (YYYY-MM-DD).

status.description: Filter tasks by status (for example active or completed).

assignedUser.description: Filter tasks by assigned user identifier or name.

tools.name: getTask
tools.description: Retrieve a single task by id. ALPS id: goTaskItem.

id.description: The unique identifier of the task to retrieve.

tools.name: createTask
tools.description: Create a new task using fields id, title, description, dueDate, status, priority, and assignedUser. ALPS id: doCreateTask.

id.description: The unique identifier for the new task.

status.description: Initial status for the task (for example active).

priority.description: Priority for the task (higher means more important).

assignedUser.description: User identifier or name assigned to the task.

tools.name: editTask
tools.description: Edit an existing task, updating fields such as title, description, dueDate, status, priority, and assignedUser. ALPS id: doEditTask.

id.description: The unique identifier of the task to edit.

dueDate.description: Updated due date for the task (YYYY-MM-DD).

priority.description: Updated numeric priority for the task.

assignedUser.description: Updated user identifier or name assigned to the task.

tools.name: updateTaskStatus
tools.description: Update the status of an existing task. ALPS id: doUpdateStatus.

id.description: The unique identifier of the task to update.

status.description: New status value for the task.

tools.name: setTaskDueDate
tools.description: Set or update the due date for a task. ALPS id: doSetDueDate.

id.description: The unique identifier of the task to update.

dueDate.description: New due date for the task (YYYY-MM-DD).

tools.name: assignTaskUser
tools.description: Assign or reassign a user to a task. ALPS id: doAssignUser.

id.description: The unique identifier of the task to update.

assignedUser.description: User identifier or name to assign to the task.
